Variable.Name: ExistingQueryError
Variable.Value: Query with the same name already exists or the name length is greater than 128. Please choose a different name.

Variable.Name: objectdescError
Variable.Value: You must enter at least 4 character(s) before the wildcard character for object_desc.

Variable.Name: objUserError
Variable.Value: Wildcard cannot be specified at the given position.Enter the required number of characters before a wildcard.

Variable.Name: TabSelectError
Variable.Value: No viewable data could be found. If the object contains some Datasets, however, please check the configuration of the following preferences to activate their rendering: VMU_Datasets, VMU_SecondaryDatasets, VMU_FileSearchOrder.

Variable.Name: DelSSError
Variable.Value: You do not have write access to object My Saved Searches

Variable.Name: InvalidTypeError
Variable.Value: Invalid Business Object Type: Item;Item Revision;Dataset

Variable.Name: MySavedSrchFldrCanntRenamed
Variable.Value: My Saved Search Folders can not be renamed.

Variable.Name: objectNameError
Variable.Value: You must enter at least 2 character(s) before the wildcard character for object_name.

Variable.Name: Noaccessibleobjectsfound
Variable.Value: Your search returned zero objects for which you have access permission. Refine your search criteria.

Variable.Name: SavedSearchmusthavecriterion
Variable.Value: A Saved Search must have at least one criterion
